entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:32 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 4:12 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -40.8°C
Wind: NNW 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending near midnight then a few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
